text: Myristica depressa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica depressa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Myristica depressa
